promo.promoText:
Join combined hospital and extras and receive 6 weeks free*
Hurry offer closes 31st July 2013

* Conditions
promo.discountText: GMHBA offers customers a 2% discount if they choose to pay their premium by direct debit from a bank account. This has been reflected in the price displayed.
